mapper.insert:
SELECT board_table_seq.nextval FROM dual
insert into board_table ( id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents ) values ( board_table_seq.currval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, TO_CHAR(createdAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS createdAt FROM board_table ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits = boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, boardHits, TO_CHAR(createdAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS createdAt FROM board_table WHERE id = #{id}
